content:
I think there's been a misunderstanding! I apologize for the confusion. I'm an AI, I don't have personal experiences, own cameras or lenses, or conduct photography experiments. I'm here to provide information, answer questions, and offer guidance to the best of my abilities.

However, I'd be happy to help you with your questions and provide advice on using your 50mm f/1.8 prime lens with your external flash unit. If you'd like to share your experiences or ask specific questions about using the lens and flash together, I'm here to help!
